AI Product Launch

SaaS Platform Go-to-Market

Challenge

Launch AI-powered analytics platform in competitive market with limited brand awareness.

Approach

Developed data-driven positioning strategy targeting mid-market companies with clear ROI messaging.

Action

Executed multi-channel campaign across LinkedIn, content marketing, and strategic partnerships.

Results

Achieved 300% user growth and $2.5M ARR within 6 months of launch.

Key Learning

AI products require clear value demonstration through case studies and demos to build trust.

Impact Metrics

+300%
User Growth
$2.5M
ARR
85%
Conversion

"The AI platform launch exceeded our expectations. Francisco's strategic approach and execution delivered results that transformed our market position."

Sarah Chen, VP of Product

⚡ How I did it

• Conducted comprehensive market analysis to identify key positioning opportunities
• Developed messaging framework targeting specific pain points of mid-market companies
• Created content strategy spanning 15 webinars and 50+ educational pieces
• Established partnerships with 3 industry influencers for credibility and reach
• Implemented multi-touch attribution to track campaign effectiveness

View Full Case Study
Growth Campaign

E-commerce Automation

Challenge

Increase online sales for e-commerce client with declining conversion rates.

Approach

Implemented automated email sequences and personalized product recommendations.

Action

Created 12 automated workflows and A/B tested messaging across customer segments.

Results

Achieved 180% increase in online sales and 65% improvement in customer retention.

Key Learning

Personalization at scale requires robust data collection and segmentation strategies.

Impact Metrics

+180%
Sales Growth
65%
Retention
40%
CAC Reduction

"Our content is finally reaching the right people. The structured approach to SEO is transforming our marketing ROI."

Mike Johnson, E-commerce Director

⚡ How I did it

• Analyzed customer behavior data to identify key drop-off points in the sales funnel
• Designed 12 automated email sequences targeting different customer segments
• Implemented A/B testing across all messaging touchpoints
• Set up personalized product recommendation engine based on browsing history
• Created comprehensive customer retention strategy with lifecycle campaigns

View Full Case Study
Automation

Marketing Workflow Automation

Challenge

Reduce manual marketing tasks while improving lead quality and response times.

Approach

Designed automated lead scoring and nurturing workflows using AI-powered tools.

Action

Integrated CRM with marketing automation platform and created 8 automated workflows.

Results

Reduced manual work by 70% while increasing lead quality by 40% and response time by 85%.

Key Learning

Automation success depends on clear workflow mapping and continuous optimization.

Impact Metrics

-70%
Manual Work
+40%
Lead Quality
+85%
Response Time

"The automation workflows have transformed our lead management process. We're now handling 3x more leads with the same team size."

Lisa Park, Marketing Operations Manager

⚡ How I did it

• Mapped existing manual processes to identify automation opportunities
• Integrated CRM system with marketing automation platform for seamless data flow
• Created 8 automated workflows handling different stages of the customer journey
• Implemented AI-powered lead scoring based on behavioral and demographic data
• Set up comprehensive reporting dashboard for continuous optimization

View Full Case Study
Customer Experience

Customer Journey Optimization

Challenge

Improve customer satisfaction and reduce churn rate for SaaS platform.

Approach

Mapped customer journey and identified friction points through data analysis.

Action

Implemented personalized onboarding flows and proactive customer success touchpoints.

Results

Reduced churn by 45% and increased customer satisfaction score by 35%.

Key Learning

Customer success is a shared responsibility between product, marketing, and support teams.

Impact Metrics

-45%
Churn Rate
+35%
Satisfaction
+60%
Retention

"The personalized onboarding experience has completely transformed how our customers engage with our platform. Retention rates have never been higher."

Rachel Martinez, Head of Customer Success

⚡ How I did it

• Conducted comprehensive customer journey mapping to identify pain points
• Created 5 personalized onboarding flows based on user segments and use cases
• Implemented 12 automated customer success touchpoints throughout the lifecycle
• Developed proactive intervention system for at-risk customers
• Established cross-functional collaboration between product, marketing, and support teams

The answers to the most
popular frequent questions

Can't find your answer? Send an email and I will get back to you.

What's your approach to product marketing?

I focus on data-driven strategies that combine customer insights with market research. My approach centers on understanding the customer journey, developing clear value propositions, and creating measurable campaigns that drive both awareness and conversion.

How do you measure marketing success?

I track a combination of leading and lagging indicators including conversion rates, customer acquisition cost, lifetime value, brand awareness metrics, and revenue attribution. The key is aligning metrics with business objectives and ensuring they're actionable.

What industries do you specialize in?

I have extensive experience in B2B SaaS, AI/ML products, e-commerce, and fintech. I particularly enjoy working with technology companies that are solving complex problems and need help communicating their value to the market.

How do you stay current with marketing trends?

I'm constantly learning through industry publications, attending conferences, participating in marketing communities, and experimenting with new tools and platforms. I also believe in the power of data to validate trends rather than just following the latest buzz.

What's your availability for new projects?

I'm currently available for new opportunities and consulting projects. I typically work with 2-3 clients at a time to ensure I can provide the attention and results each project deserves. Let's discuss your specific needs and timeline.

Your product deserves traction.

Let's make it happen.
